name: Fencing Simulator 2700
description:
yeah so I made a high tech 2700 edition simulator of fencing for everyone who wants to know how to fence but doesn't have the equipment to just go fence and see for themselves what it's really like to fence and this is way easier and takes less effort anyway

enjoy . it took me 3 and a half hours to make just so you can have 20 seconds of amusement I really polished this project a lot and made it high tech and stuff so yeah
